items.content_html: DsCart.js is a lightweight, customizable JavaScript library for creating a shopping cart system. It supports adding, removing, and managing items, with easy-to-use functions for integration into any website.

items.content_html: A lightweight, static web app that fetches images from a Google Drive folder and displays them in a full screen slideshow. Written to run on Raspberry Pis in the repair shop where I volunteer.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript utility library designed for running local language models (LLMs) like Gemma 2B directly on edge devices. This project aims to provide developers with easy-to-use tools for integrating AI capabilities into web applications without relying on external servers.

items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.
items.title: Devjosef/DocuComp: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

items.content_html: Linkr is a modern, lightweight social threading app where users can share and engage in threaded conversations. Built with scalability and user experience in mind, this project showcases the essentials of social networking with a focus on clean design and efficient performance.
items.title: AviratShambharkar/linkr: Linkr is a modern, lightweight social threading app where users can share and engage in threaded conversations. Built with scalability and user experience in mind, this project showcases the essentials of social networking with a focus on clean design and efficient performance.
